info.institution: Centre de Recherche en Informatique de Lens, University of Artois
info.summary:
Salem Benferhat works as a Full professor in Centre de Recherche en Informatique de Lens, University of Artois, and his\her h-index is 42, g-index is 77. His\Her interests are :
 Possibility Theory; Knowledge Base; Possibilistic Logic; Intrusion Detection; Belief Revision;
